about_the_game:
Tokyo Xanadu eX+; a massive action RPG! When high school student Kou Tokisaka encounters the nightmare realm known as the Eclipse, his world is forever changed.

To use the DLC items, they must be first claimed from within the game. To claim the DLC items in-game, open the "Camp Menu" screen, select the menu option "ITEM", and navigate to the DLC tab. From there, select each of the DLC items purchased that you wish to activate in-game.

The Item Bundle will provide you with the following:

Uber Potion Set 1

A sample pack of high-grade restoration items (three of each!)

Cure Potion III x 3
Breath Potion III x 3
Resurrection II x 3


Uber Potion Set 2

A sample pack of high-grade restoration items (three of each!)

Cure Potion III x 3
Breath Potion III x 3
Resurrection II x 3


Uber Potion Set 3

A sample pack of high-grade restoration items (three of each!)

Cure Potion III x 3
Breath Potion III x 3
Resurrection II x 3


Wonder-Med Set 1

A sample pack of uber-powerful medicines (three of each)!

Elixir x 3
Star Soma x 3
Lunar Soma x 3
Solar Soma x 3


Wonder-Med Set 2

A sample pack of uber-powerful medicines (three of each)!

Elixir x 3
Star Soma x 3
Lunar Soma x 3
Solar Soma x 3


Wonder-Med Set 3

A sample pack of uber-powerful medicines (three of each)!

Elixir x 3
Star Soma x 3
Lunar Soma x 3
Solar Soma x 3


Soul Food Set 1

A package of five different Eclipse ingredients (twenty of each)!

Mead x 20
Ambrosia x 20
Solar Eggs x 20
Lunar Mutton x 20
Star Truffle x 20


Soul Food Set 2

A package of five different Eclipse ingredients (twenty of each)!

Mead x 20
Ambrosia x 20
Solar Eggs x 20
Lunar Mutton x 20
Star Truffle x 20


Soul Food Set 3

A package of five different Eclipse ingredients (twenty of each)!

Mead x 20
Ambrosia x 20
Solar Eggs x 20
Lunar Mutton x 20
Star Truffle x 20


Elementally Elements Set

A sampling of five useful elements.

Element Force II x 1
Element Veil II x 1
Element Shield II x 1
Element Life II x 1
Element Wand II x 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad 2.4GHz or comparable
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or comparable
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card

short_description: A bundle of useful in-game items which include various potions, cooking ingredients, and elements!
